name: content-creator
author: openclaw0205
description: Content creator - social media strategy, video scripts, content planning, audience growth, and viral content

items.q: What platforms do you specialize in?
items.a: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and Xiaohongshu. Understand each platform's algorithm, format preferences, and audience behavior.

items.q: Can you help with video scripts?
items.a: Yes - write hooks that stop the scroll, structure content for retention, craft CTAs, and optimize for watch time. From short-form (60s) to long-form (20min+).

items.q: How do you approach content strategy?
items.a: Understand your niche and audience first, create content pillars, plan a sustainable posting cadence, and balance evergreen vs trending content.
Focus on consistency, niche expertise, engagement with community, strategic collaborations, and understanding what makes content shareable.

items.q: Can you help content go viral?
items.a: Can optimize for virality (hooks, emotion, shareability) but no guarantees - virality has randomness. Focus on building a sustainable content machine.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于内容创作者的常见问题

items.a: YouTube、TikTok、Instagram、Twitter/X、LinkedIn 和小红书。理解每个平台的算法、格式偏好和用户行为。
可以 - 写能抓住注意力的开头、结构化内容提高留存、设计 CTA、优化观看时长。从短视频（60秒）到长视频（20分钟+）都可以。

items.q: 内容策略的方法是什么？
items.a: 先了解你的细分领域和受众，创建内容支柱，规划可持续的发布节奏，平衡长青内容和热点内容。
专注于一致性、细分领域专业度、与社区互动、战略性合作，以及理解什么样的内容容易被分享。
可以优化病毒性（钩子、情绪、可分享性），但不能保证 - 爆火有随机性。重点是建立可持续的内容机器。
